Notes.Text:
This update for samba fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-20251: Fixed an issue where the bad password count would
  not be properly incremented, which could allow attackers to brute
  force a user's password (bsc#1206546).
Notes.Title: Details

Notes.Text: The CVRF data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
Notes.Title: Terms of Use

Vulnerabilities.Description: A flaw was found in samba. A race condition in the password lockout code may lead to the risk of brute force attacks being successful if special conditions are met.
